attributes.action: stop the conversion of Eastbourne Technology College into an Academy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Eastbourne Technology College is a rapidly improving community school. The staff have worked exceptionally hard to bring about improvements in GCSE results, and the Contextual Value Added score is amongst the highest in the County. August’s results brought it above the National Challenge floor.
East Sussex have announced plans to fast-track the school into an academy. We do not believe that this is in the best interests of ETC- it should be given the support and resources to continue improving, as a Community School.
We agree that the school needs investment in buildings, but would urge the Government to support this through “Building Schools for the Future.”
Staff have serious concerns about the lead sponsor, Sussex Downs College, which is in dispute with its own staff over retaining nationally agreed contracts. 
We believe the school should remain owned by and accountable to the community. In particular, to fast track the process will deny the local community a full and balanced debate.
